name: Gods Among Men (GAM)
description:
In Gods Among Men, you play as a god-like character in VR trying to destroy a castle. However, you can possess any member of your army to explore, fight as a soldier, and gain a quicker victory! 

Our current build has a castle that attacks the player and their army, possession mechanics for the Orc army,  and a victory explosion when won!

In the future, we plan on adding more weapon types (we already developed a bow and arrow, but were unable to include it due to the animation of the AI being time consuming, the ability to pick up and throw members of the army and other game objects, god-like abilities like lightning and fire, different playable characters (sci fi, western, modern, etc...), and some multiplayer modes including God vs God (GvG) and a Castle Defense mode.
